name: Erik Benton
caption: A curious, thoughtful engineer and technical leader providing guidance and support for the fairhub.io and tools projects.

name: Camille Nebeker
department: School of Public Health and Human Longevity Science
caption: I co-founded and direct UC San Diego ReCODE Health center, which provides education and consultation services to guide consideration of the ethical, legal and social implications of digital/AI health research. For AI-READI, our Ethical and Trustworthy AI team will foster awareness of ethical and responsible practices (e.g., risk assessment, informed consent, return of results) across all modules.

name: Brittany York
department: Herbert Wertheim School of Public Health and Human Longevity Science
caption: Brittany York is a Project Manager for the ETAI module. She joined UC San Diego in 2011 working on federally funded research projects related to physical activity, sedentary behavior, and chronic disease prevention.

name: Sally Baxter
department: Viterbi Family Department of Ophthalmology and Shiley Eye Institute
caption: I'm an Assistant Professor of Ophthalmology and Biomedical Informatics at UCSD, and for this project I am serving as the Module PI for the Skills and Workforce Development Module and the Co-Site PI for the Data Acquisition Module at UCSD.

name: Sara Singer
organization: Stanford University School of Medicine and Graduate School of Business
caption: Principal Investigator for the AI-READI Teaming Module, more generally I study teams and organizations to understand how leaders and policymakers can improve the safety, quality, equity of health and health care delivery through changes in institutional culture, leadership, organization design, and team dynamics.

name: Debra Mathews
department: Berman Institute of Bioethics, Dept of Genetic Medicine
caption: I'm a human geneticist by training, but all of my work is on ethical and policy issues raised by emerging technologies, including genetics, neuroscience, regenerative medicine, synthetic biology, and AI, including through work with the ETAI module of AI-READI.

name: Victoria Patronilo
caption: I am helping coordinate the AI-READI internship program with the skills and workforce development module.

name: Benjamin Cordier
caption: I'm a computational scientist experienced in algorithm design, model development, and interactive data visualization. As part of AI-READI, I'll be building tools to enable the harmonization, comprehension, and reuse of data by researchers.

name: Shannon McWeeney
caption: M-PI of the Tools Module focused on data equity, accessibility and patient engagement.

name: Cynthia Owsley
roles: Nathan E. Miles Endowed Chair of Ophthalmology
caption: I am MPI on the Data Acquisition Module since I have a great deal of experience in recruiting, enrolling and supervising large sample studies of adults using detailed protocols, including variables such as vision, cognition and retinal imaging.

name: Katie Crist
caption: Dr. Crist's research is focused on how behavioral and built environment interventions impact physical activity and health. She brings her experience using wearable technologies to monitor behaviors and environmental exposures to the ETAI module.

name: Abigail Lucero
caption: I'm a Project Manager in support of the innovative and committed team in the Tools module.

name: Sanjay Soundarajan
caption: I am a front end developer with experience in building web applications and data visualization tools. I am excited to be a part of the Tools module and help build tools that will help researchers and clinicians better understand and use data.

name: Joseph Yracheta
caption: I am a 56-year-old, well-rounded academic scientist specializing in Indigenous and Marginalized group concerns on the Big Data Era.

name: Linda Zangwill
caption: I am a Professor at the Viterbi Family Department of Ophthalmology at UCSD conducting clinical and computational research with a focus on glaucoma.  I am co-PI with Dr. Sally Baxter on the Skills and Workforce Development Module and am also site PI (with Dr. Sally Baxter as co-PI) on the Data module.

name: Missy Takahashi
caption: I am the research lab manager at the University of Washington for Drs. Aaron and Cecilia Lee, who were awarded the AI-READI grant. I am working with the data module on study start-up as well as providing other administrative and logistical support.

name: Dawn Matthies
department: Dept. of Ophthalmology and Visual Sciences
caption: I serve as the project manager for the Data Acquisition module, responsible for coordinating communication between our three data sites and supporting the development of the protocol, its implementation, and data collection.

name: Samantha Hurst
department: Herbert Wertheim School of Public Health
caption: I am a medical anthropologist centered in a public health research space.  I am an MPI in the ETAI module and the liaison and Chair for the three regional Advisory Boards supporting AI-READI data collection.

name: Bhavesh Patel
caption: I am an M-PI for the Tools module, leading the development of fairhub.io through my expertise in FAIR data practices and development of research software.

name: Qilu Yu
department: Office of Clinical and Regulatory Affairs
organization: National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health
caption: I am the lead biostatistician at the National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health, NIH, working as a project scientist for the AI-READI project.

name: T. Y. Alvin Liu
roles: Director of the Wilmer Precision Ophthalmology Center of Excellence
caption: Contact PI for the ETAI Module

name: Megan Collins
caption: I am a pediatric ophthalmologist and medical ethicist interested in health equity and access to care.

name: Nicole Ehrhardt
caption: Dr Ehrhardt is an adult Endocrinologist at the University of Washington Diabetes Institute. Her research is focused on use of real-time continuous glucose monitoring

name: Virginia de Sa
department: Cognitive Science and Halicioglu Data Science Institute
caption: I'm a Professor in Cognitive Science, and Associate Director of the Halicioglu Data Science Institute at UC San Diego studying vision and learning in humans and machines as well as brain-computer interfaces.  For this project I am developing  machine learning training.

name: Jennifer Li-Pook-Than
caption: Expertise in Big-Omics Precision Health Science and Advocacy for the Indigenous and Diverse Populations; AI-READI PEDP Lead.

name: Aaron Lee
roles: C. Dan and Irene Hunter Endowed Professorship
caption: Aaron Lee is the overall principal investigator for the AI-READI project and the co-lead for the Standards module.

name: Cecilia Lee
roles: Klorfine Family Endowed Chair Director of Clinical Research
caption: TBA

name: Julia Owen
caption: I am the overall Program Manager for the AI-READI project, as well as a Project Manager on the Standards module.

name: Kate Watkins
department: Primary Care & Population Health at Stanford Medicine
caption: I serve as the project manager for the Teaming module.

name: Kadija Ferryman
caption: I'm an anthropologist and faculty member at Johns Hopkins and I'm a module co-PI of the ETAI module.
